# indentationWidth

**Instance Property**

The width of an indentation level.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var indentationWidth: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The overall indentation is the product of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewListCell/indentationWidth] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewListCell/indentationLevel].

## Customizing layout

- **indentationLevel**: The level of indentation for the cell.
- **indentsAccessories**: A Boolean value that detemines whether the cell indents accessories on the leading side.
- **separatorLayoutGuide**: A guide for laying out separators in relation to the primary content in the cell.
